action.action-desc: Mr. Steube introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To provide that certain changes to the Manual of Military Decorations and Awards shall have no force or effect.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preserve Military Recognition Act of 2023.

section.header: Prohibition of gender-neutral pronoun in joint personal military decoration citations
section.text: Changes to Figure 3 (regarding opening sentences for joint personal military decoration citations of the Department of Defense) of the Manual of Military Decorations and Awards: DoD Joint Decorations and Awards (Department of Defense Manual 1348.33, Vol. 4 (December 21, 2016)) that became effective on August 7, 2023, and requires the use of the gender-neutral pronoun themself in joint personal military decoration citations of the Department of Defense, shall have no force or effect.
